https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/k99YLo6oHZeixyr4AqgDJEhve50.jpg Three friends from college are now on the brink of turning 40. To attend a funeral on Jeju Island, they go on an unexpected trip as a getaway and wind up at a guest house, where water shimmers, wind blows, and pretty women are seductive, inviting the trio back to their 20s. Detour
